programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: A veteran detective leads a special task force to capture a ruthless gang leader responsible for a series of violent robberies and murders. As the criminal mastermind continually evades capture, the officer becomes obsessed with bringing him to justice.

programme.title: Brothers Till We Die
programme.desc: A feared gangster known as the Hunchback of Rome returns from exile to organize a daring armored truck robbery. When he is betrayed by his own partners, he sets out on a brutal path of revenge.

programme.title: Atomic Apocalypse
programme.desc: In a devastated post-apocalyptic world, a lone survivor fights against hostile raiders and dangerous conditions while searching desperately for her lost family.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: A routine HVAC repair turns into a nightmare when a technician becomes trapped and must survive a terrifying and deadly situation before nightfall.

programme.title: Bruce and the Dragon Fist
programme.desc: A skilled martial artist must defend his village and honor against ruthless enemies while mastering powerful fighting techniques.

programme.title: Treasure of Bruce Le
programme.desc: A martial artist searches for a legendary treasure while facing deadly rivals and uncovering dangerous secrets.

programme.title: Kung Fu Traveler 2
programme.desc: A time-traveling warrior journeys to ancient China to find a legendary kung fu master capable of defeating alien invaders.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: A tough detective travels overseas to extradite a violent criminal and dismantle a brutal international crime operation.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: In ninth-century China, an exiled assassin must choose between her duty and her emotions when ordered to kill a man from her past.
